segments.text: Our factory locates at a village in the east of the city . The area of it is 3,600 square meters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd like to visit the factory . Can you show me the way ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's OK ! We'll take you to have a tour . Please follow me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many shifts are there in your factory ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are two shifts now in total .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about your company's QC management ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We established the strict QC standards and we have followed it for about five years with good results .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where are the workers from ? From the villages nearby ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most of them live in the city . We provide free commuter buses for the workers . Besides , we built the dormitory building for the workers on night shift .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds nice . We can't wait to visiting the factory .
segments.speaker: S2
